Coverage Area

The AP12000HS is equipped with 12,000 BTUs of cooling power and can effectively cool a room up to 425 square feet in size. This compact, yet powerful portable air conditioner is perfect for cooling bedrooms or small living spaces. The AP12000HS doubles as a heater to provide an extra boost of warmth on chilly nights and allows you to use the AP12000HS year round.

How to Install

$include('Include-VideoDisplay','podID','JTBZ6VHU')$
  • Step 1: Place window kit plate into window opening.
  • Step 2: Slide plate to cover the width of the opening.
  • Step 3: Close window to hold plate in place.
  • Step 4: Attach exhaust hose to the unit.
  • Step 5: Place the other end of the exhaust hose into the hole on the window plate.

To easily vent the portable air conditioner, the AP12000HS includes a window kit that can conveniently be fitted in windows that are 28.5" - 56" in size. For larger windows or use in sliding glass doors, purchase the APPK2010 kit which expands up to 83”. Window kits for portable air conditioners take up much less space than installing a window air conditioner, which means you don't have to worry about blocking the light or view from your window.

Features

Quiet Operation

At 52 dB (low) and 54 dB (high), this unit can be placed in any room without being disruptive.

Self-Evaporative System

Built with an automatic drain system that is able to exhaust all liquid formed by condensation so that there is no need to manually drain the unit in most climates.

Automatic Restart

The intelligent design auto restart function stores your selected settings so that in the event of a power failure the unit will restart just as before when the electricity comes back on.

Three (3) Fan Speeds

Choose between high, medium, and low fan speeds to find the perfect setting for air output and noise.

Control Panel

1. Power

Switches unit on/off.

2. Mode

Cool, dehumidify and fan only mode.

3. Speed

Sets the fan to high/medium/low.

4. Timer

Enables timer mode. Adjustable from 1-12 hours.

5. Up / Down

Increases temperature or time when timer is enabled. Decreases temperature or time when timer is enabled.

6. LED Display

Shows ambient temperature, set temperature, and hours when timer is in use.

Remote

All of the settings on the unit can be conveniently controlled from across the room via the remote control.

$include('Include-VideoDisplay','podID','C0NBH67F')$

Drain

Condensate is expelled from the unit through the hose, but in more humid climates where moisture is more prevalent, the excess moisture can be drained through the drain in the back of the unit.

Benefits

No Restriction

For spaces where window air units are not allowed, portable air conditioners are a great alternative as they do not protrude from the outside, allowing them to comply with building codes and HOA’s.

Non-Permanent Installation

As long as there is a place to vent the hot air and a standard electrical outlet available, portable air conditioners can be used wherever and whenever needed and easily moved or stored when not in use.

Cut Costs

Instead of turning down your central A/C unit for that one room that is always a few degrees hotter than the rest, Portable ACs can be an efficient way to cool hot spots in your home without sacrificing your electricity bill.

User Friendly

Easy to connect and operate, portable air conditioners can be used wherever and whenever needed and easily moved or stored when not in use.

Optional Accessories

Carbon Filter 5 Pack For AP12000HS

Removes smoke and other odors from the air. Each filter lasts 2-3 months.

$include('Include-AddToCartButton','productID','AP12000FILT5PACK','buttonSize','medium','redirectToCart','false')$

3M Antimicrobial Air Filter 5-Pack for AP12000HS

These upgraded antimicrobial filters have a unique microstructure and electrostatic charge that captures dust, lint, smoke, pollen, and mold spores.

$include('Include-AddToCartButton','productID','AP12000FILT3M-AM5','buttonSize','medium','redirectToCart','false')$

Upgraded Portable AC Vent Kit for Sliding Glass Doors and Large Windows

Upgrade your installation options with this large window and sliding door vent kit.

$include('Include-AddToCartButton','productID','APPK2010','buttonSize','medium','redirectToCart','false')$
Super PDP - AP12000HS

Coverage Area

The PAC1201W is equipped with 12,000 BTUs of cooling power and can effectively cool a room up to 400 square feet in size. This compact, yet powerful portable air conditioner is perfect for cooling bedrooms or living spaces. The PAC1201W doubles as a 45 pint dehumidifier, which removes excess humidity from the air, helping the space to feel even cooler and improving air quality.

How to Install

$include('Include-VideoDisplay','podID','MKD2OEQQ')$
  • Step 1: Place window kit plate into window opening.
  • Step 2: Slide plate to cover the width of the opening.
  • Step 3: Close window to hold plate in place.
  • Step 4: Attach exhaust hose to the unit.
  • Step 5: Place the other end of the exhaust hose into the hole on the window plate.

To easily vent the portable air conditioner, the PAC1201W includes a window kit that can conveniently be fitted in windows that are 26 1/2" - 48 1/3" in size. Window kits for portable air conditioners take up much less space than installing a window air conditioner, which means you don't have to worry about blocking the light or view from your window.

Features

Self-Evaporative System

Built with an automatic drain system that is able to exhaust all liquid formed by condensation so that there is no need to manually drain the unit in most climates.

Automatic Restart

The intelligent design auto restart function stores your selected settings so that in the event of a power failure the unit will restart just as before when the electricity comes back on.

Three (3) Fan Speeds

Choose between high, medium, and low fan speeds to find the perfect setting for air output and noise.

Programmable Timer

The 24 hour programmable timer allows you to set the unit to run for a set amount of time before automatically turning off.

Control Panel

1. Power

Switches unit on/off.

2. Mode

Auto, cool, dehumidify and fan mode.

3. Fan

Choose between high/medium/low fan speed.

4. Timer

Enables timer mode.

5. Swing

Sets the louvers to swing automatically.

6. Up

Increases temperature or time when timer is enabled.

7. Down

Decreases temperature or time when timer is enabled.

8. LED Display

Shows ambient temperature when in fan and dehumidify mode, set temperature in cool mode, and hours when timer is in use.

Remote

All of the settings on the unit can be conveniently controlled from across the room via the remote control.

$include('Include-VideoDisplay','podID','C0NBH67F')$

Drain

Condensate is expelled from the unit through the hose, but in more humid climates where moisture is more prevalent, the excess moisture can be drained through the drain in the back of the unit.

Benefits

No Restrictions

For spaces where window air units are not allowed, portable air conditioners are a great alternative as they do not protrude from the outside, allowing them to comply with building codes and HOA’s.

Non-Permanent Installation

As long as there is a place to vent the hot air and a standard electrical outlet available, portable air conditioners can be used wherever and whenever needed and easily moved or stored when not in use.

Cut Costs

Instead of turning down your central A/C unit for that one room that is always a few degrees hotter than the rest, Portable ACs can be an efficient way to cool hot spots in your home without sacrificing your electricity bill.

User Friendly

Easy to connect and operate, portable air conditioners can be used wherever and whenever needed and easily moved or stored when not in use.

Optional Accessories

Carbon Filters for PAC1201W

Helps to remove smoke, odor and contaminants from the air.

$include('Include-AddToCartButton','productID','PAC801FILT5PACK','buttonSize','medium','redirectToCart','false')$

Security Window Lock with Deluxe Lever Action

Ensure your window is securely locked when a window kit is installed.

$include('Include-AddToCartButton','productID','LEVERWINDOWLOCK','buttonSize','medium','redirectToCart','false')$

Portable Air Conditioner Drop Ceiling Vent Kit

Vent your portable air conditioner through your drop ceiling with this ceiling vent kit.

Edgestar built-in wine coolers are inspired by you to fit seamlessly into your lifestyle and suit your specific wine storage needs. This space saving, slim design has a 12 " width and allows you to store and display up to 18 bottles of your favorite wine. Loaded with features and an elegant design this wine refrigerator is a popular choice that will perfectly blend into any home décor.

Single Temperature Zone

Choose the perfect cellar temperature of 55° F or select from the wide temperature range of 40-65° F to customize your desired temperature based on your specific collection.

Air Cooled Technology

The entire interior will be cooled to your desired temperature as air cooled technology uses powerful circulation fans to evenly distribute cool air eliminating hot spots and uneven cooling.

Tinted Glass

UV rays can cause a host of problems for any wine collection. In addition to providing unwanted heat, which puts needless strain on your cooling unit, exposure to UV light can alter the chemical makeup of your wine, potentially affecting taste and maturation. The tinted glass door ensures that while your wine bottles are visible, the integrity of your wine is protected from the potential harm of harsh light and UV rays.

Digital Controls

One of the most important elements of a cooling system is the controls. They should be accessible, easily understood, and provide you with accurate information on the exact temperature you are attempting to achieve. The intuitive touch control and digital temperature display allow you to easily adjust and monitor the desired temperature based on your specific cooling needs.

Elegant Design

The sleek stainless steel trim door, soft LED interior lighting and classic slide-out wood trimmed shelves provide a timeless design to showcase your treasured collection. Whatever the setting, these units are sure to spark conversation about their attractive and pleasing aesthetic.

$include('Include-VideoDisplay', 'podID', 'C44EB167')$

Reversible Door

The reversible door allows you to choose whether the door swings open to the left or to the right.

Shelf Bottle Arrangement

This shelf layout will allow you to achieve the maximum bottle capacity based on a ‘Typical Bordeaux’ bottle.

Bottle Sizes and Storage Capacity

The standard bottle capacity is based off of the ‘Typical Bordeaux’ bottle dimensions. Please note that if storing larger bottle sizes, the bottle storage capacity will be reduced. The above image shows the different bottle dimensions of some of the most popular wine bottles.

The standard bottle capacity is based off of the ‘Typical Bordeaux’ bottle dimensions. Please note that if storing larger bottle sizes, the bottle storage capacity will be reduced. The above image shows the different bottle dimensions of some of the most popular wine bottles.

Edgestar built-in wine coolers are inspired by you to fit seamlessly into your lifestyle and suit your specific wine storage needs. This large capacity design has a 24” width and is perfect for a wine collector or avid entertainer as it will store and display up to 166 bottles of your favorite wine. Loaded with features and an elegant design this wine refrigerator is a popular choice that will perfectly blend into any home décor.

Single Temperature Zone

Choose the perfect cellar temperature of 55° F or select from the wide temperature range of 40-65° F to customize your desired temperature based on your specific collection.

Air Cooled Technology

The entire interior will be cooled to your desired temperature as air cooled technology uses powerful circulation fans to evenly distribute cool air eliminating hot spots and uneven cooling.

Tinted Glass

UV rays can cause a host of problems for any wine collection. In addition to providing unwanted heat, which puts needless strain on your cooling unit, exposure to UV light can alter the chemical makeup of your wine, potentially affecting taste and maturation. The tinted glass door ensures that while your wine bottles are visible, the integrity of your wine is protected from the potential harm of harsh light and UV rays.

Digital Controls

One of the most important elements of a cooling system is the controls. They should be accessible, easily understood, and provide you with accurate information on the exact temperature you are attempting to achieve. The intuitive touch control and digital temperature display allow you to easily adjust and monitor the desired temperature based on your specific cooling needs.

Elegant Design

The sleek stainless steel trim door, soft LED interior lighting and classic slide-out wood trimmed shelves provide a timeless design to showcase your treasured collection. Whatever the setting, these units are sure to spark conversation about their attractive and pleasing aesthetic.

Shelf Bottle Arrangement

This shelf layout will allow you to achieve the maximum bottle capacity based on a ‘Typical Bordeaux’ bottle.

Built-In Drip Tray

The sleek, stainless steel flush-mount drip tray is built into the worktop to handle any spills or overflow. Any excess liquid drains into an internal catch bottle for easy clean up.

Forced Air-Cooled Beer Tower

The ECK24SS-XX uses an internal fan pipe to redirect cold air up into the tower, preventing foam while ensuring for a completely chilled pour from keg to glass.

Large Capacity Interior

Due to its large interior, this commercial refrigerator can hold up to four sixth barrel commercial kegs. It can also fit full size half barrel kegs, oversized beveled edge kegs, pony kegs or two slim quarter kegs.

Optional CO2 Knockout

The optional CO2 knockout (with plug) allows you to connect CO2 or nitrogen tanks externally to save interior space or allow for larger tank options.

Forced Air Refrigeration

The commercial grade forced air refrigeration system distributes cold air throughout the unit to maintain the desired temperature and eliminating possible hot spots to ensure the perfect pour with every dispense.

Secure

The included built-in key lock helps provide an extra layer of security to prevent unwanted use or changes in regulator settings.

ETL-S Listed

The Edgestar ECK24 commericial kegerator is ETL-S listed to NSF-18 standard for commercial use. The NSF-18 standard establishes sanitation requirements for the materials, design, construction and performance of equipment that dispense beverages.

Two Year Warranty

Unlike other commercial companies, EdgeStar validates this unit's warranty for both commercial and residential use.

Built-In Drip Tray

The sleek, stainless steel flush-mount drip tray is built into the worktop to handle any spills or overflow. Any excess liquid drains into an internal catch bottle for easy clean up.

Forced Air-Cooled Beer Tower

The ECK24SS4T uses an internal fan pipe to redirect cold air up into the tower, preventing foam while ensuring for a completely chilled pour from keg to glass.

Large Capacity Interior

Due to its large interior, this commercial refrigerator can hold up to four sixth barrel commercial kegs. It can also fit full size half barrel kegs, oversized beveled edge kegs, pony kegs or two slim quarter kegs.

Optional CO2 Knockout

The optional CO2 knockout (with plug) allows you to connect CO2 or nitrogen tanks externally to save interior space or allow for larger tank options.

Forced Air Refrigeration

The commercial grade forced air refrigeration system distributes cold air throughout the unit to maintain the desired temperature and eliminating possible hot spots to ensure the perfect pour with every dispense.

Secure

The included built-in key lock helps provide an extra layer of security to prevent unwanted use or changes in regulator settings.

ETL-S Listed

The Edgestar ECK24 commericial kegerator is ETL-S listed to NSF-18 standard for commercial use. The NSF-18 standard establishes sanitation requirements for the materials, design, construction and performance of equipment that dispense beverages.

Two Year Warranty

Unlike other commercial companies, EdgeStar validates this unit's warranty for both commercial and residential use.

The commercial grade forced air refrigeration system distributes cold air throughout the unit to maintain the desired temperature and eliminating possible hot spots to ensure the perfect pour with every dispense.

Secure

The included built-in key lock helps provide an extra layer of security to prevent unwanted use or changes in regulator settings.

ETL-S Listed

The Edgestar ECK24 commericial kegerator is ETL-S listed to NSF-18 standard for commercial use. The NSF-18 standard establishes sanitation requirements for the materials, design, construction and performance of equipment that dispense beverages.

Two Year Warranty

Unlike other commercial companies, EdgeStar validates this unit's warranty for both commercial and residential use.

Scotsman is one of the most trusted brands in the ice machine industry. They have been on the cutting edge of technology since introducing their first crystal-clear, slow-melting ice cube in 1950. Features

Electronic Control Panel

All of your unit settings, including temperature and interior lighting, are easily adjusted using the electronic control panel with push buttons and digital temperature display.

Built-In Capable

Because of its front ventilation, you can build this unit into cabinetry for a seamlessly integrated look or place it under a counter.

Forced Air-Cooled Beer Tower

Cold air is directed up to and throughout the beer tower, preventing lost beer from a foaming first pour and ensuring that your brew stays cold from keg to glass.

LED Interior Lighting

LED interior lighting illuminates your keg(s) and components while consuming less energy and not emitting any heat, so the temperature of your keg(s) will remain uncompromised.

15-inch Slim Width Design

This unit was specially designed to fit narrow spaces with a 15-inch slim width design. Great unit to replace an old trash compactor or that empty space in your cabinetry. Have draft beer at home without sacrificing a ton of space.

Ice Cold Beer

Whether you prefer a cool stout or an ice cold lager, you'll be able to keep your kegs as cold as you please using the integrated thermostat that goes as low as 32°F.

Reversible Door w/ Lock

You have the option of reversing the door swing if you happen to prefer a certain direction or would like the unit to follow the flow of your cabinetry. The integrated door lock provides extra security from unauthorized use.

Fits Up to a 1/4 Slim Keg

The KC1500 is the only 15-inch wide kegerator on the market that can hold up to a 1/4 slim barrel sized keg. It can also accommodate the popular sixth barrel keg which most craft beer is available in.

Easy 30 Minute Assembly

Use our easy to follow instruction guide or assembly video to build your kegerator. The average assembly time is 30-40 minutes and can be completed with minimal skill.

* Please keep in mind the co2 tank comes empty due to HAZMAT shipping restrictions and will need to be filled at a local air/gas or welding supplier.

Recommended Cleaning Kits

We recommend cleaning your beer lines after every keg or a minimum of every two weeks. Here are our most popular options:

$include('ProductCards-MidSize', 'pid','CK100')$

Our best-selling, easy to use, gravity fed cleaning kit will get the job done.

$include('ProductCards-MidSize', 'pid','CK200')$

Pump your dirty beer lines clean with this convenient, pump-style, cleaning setup.

$include('ProductCards-MidSize', 'pid','M5-801147-CK')$

The pressurized kit cleans everything and does not require you to remove the faucet.

Frequently Asked Questions

Can I build-in this unit undercounter?
Yes. Its front ventilating design allows you to build this unit into undercounter applications.

Do I need anything else?
This setup comes with essentially everything you need to get started. All you’ll need to do is get the gas cylinder filled and a keg of your favorite beer.

How many kegs will the co2 tank last?
Once filled, the gas cylinder that is provided will usually last 4-5 full sized kegs or approximately 13-15 sixth barrel kegs.

Where do I get my co2 tank filled?
Co2 is a commonly used commercial gas. You should be able to find a local air/gas or welding supplier to fill your tank.

How long will a keg of beer stay fresh in a kegerator?
Typically domestic kegs can last 6-8 weeks staying under the proper temperature and pressure. Pasteurized beers, usually imported kegs, can last up to 12 weeks.

Flake Ice

Flake ice is ideal for presentation and preservation of perishable food items. Flake ice extends the life and appearance of fruits, vegetables and seafood by maintaining food hydration. It is also great for use in healthcare applications.

Click for more info

Cube Ice

Ice-O-Martic cubers produce either half, full, grande or gourmet ice cubes. Half cube is perfect for blended drinks due to its smaller size and ability to break down. The classic, long-lasting full cube is the perfect complement to any beverage or cocktail. Grande cubes are twice the size as full cubes and great for cocktails and nightclubs. Gourmet ice is uniquely shaped and crystal clear making it a favorite for fine dining, receptions and events.

Click for more info

Bottle Coolers

True’s deep well, horizontal bottle coolers are top-loading for convenient reach-in bottle retrieval and designed to perform in the busiest of commercial environments. The forced air cooling feature cools warm contents quickly and the positively guided airflow ensures that the bottles on top are cooled first. The refrigeration system is oversized to maintain cooler product temperatures. The heavy-duty, galvanized steel interior provides durability while a stainless steel countertop provides additional work space.

Reach In Refrigerators

True’s reach in refrigerators are constructed using the highest quality materials and components. They are designed to provide exceptional food safety and lower utility costs. They are available in a variety of sizes including one, two or three sections. The self-closing doors are available in solid stainless steel or double pane, low-e glass. The high capacity, factory-balanced refrigeration system maintains colder product temperatures for the best in food preservation.

Beer Dispensers

True’s direct draw beer dispensers are built with the highest quality materials and are available in 4 sizes. The exterior is made of heavy-duty vinyl or stainless steel to protect the keg. The interior features a stainless steel floor and galvanized steel walls for extra durability and insulation. The oversized refrigeration system allows for faster temperature recovery and shorter run times while the forced air cooling filters into the beer column preventing foam from being dispensed. For enduring quality and value, a True kegerator cannot be beat.

Back Bar Refrigerators

Back bar coolers from True are available in a variety of sizes and styles. All are equipped with a stainless steel counter top, two adjustable wire shelves per door, energy efficient LED lights, a stainless steel floor and durable, galvanized steel walls. Choose between a wear resistant, vinyl laminated or stainless steel exterior and solid or double pane, low-e glass doors. The oversized refrigeration system allows for faster temperature recovery. The dependable and convenient back bar coolers from True are perfect for any commercial application.
